channel.title: Comments for page "Very Tragic Story"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Very Tragic Story"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: The name of this mission seems to be a reference to the Jusenkyo Guide from Ranma 1/2. Whenever anyone enters Jusenkyo, he attempts to warn them of the various curses. His speech frequently begins "Very tragic story."
